name: THE REAL BACKROOMS
description:
SIMPLE GAME ABOUT THE REAL BACKROOMS

You are trapped in THE BACKROOMS and you have to escape from the entity

HINT TO ESCAPE  - 

DONT GO CLOSE TO ENTITY OTHERWISE IF YOU ARE IN SIGHT RANGE OF HIM, HE WILL CHASE YOU BUT STILL YOU WILL BE ABLE TO CONFUSE HIM BY HIDING BEHIND WALLS

FEATURES - 

1 - Realistic environment

2 - Supports 60 FPS

3 - Highly optimized

4 - AI bacteria entity which will chase you until you are dead

5 - Simple controls

6 - Realistic lighting

7 - Totally free game without any payments or in-app purchases

8 - Fully offline

IF YOU HAVE SUGGETIONS OR REQUESTS , FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME AT

pratham007talukdar@gmail.com

THIS GAME IS MADE BY PRATHAM TALUKDAR
